#' TreeKO

TreeKO is an algorithm for comparing trees that contain duplications
[@MarcetHouben2011]

```{r init}
library("ape")
geneTree1 <- ape::read.tree(text = "((E1, D1), ((A3, ((C1, A2), (B1, A1))D2)D1));")
plot(geneTree1, show.node.label = TRUE)
mtext("Gene tree 1", 1)
```
